title.rendered: Dorothy Nolan Gives Back: Family Game Night Bags for SNACPack Recipients

content.rendered:
Dorothy Nolan Elementary School partnered with the Kelley Family Charitable Foundation on a heartwarming initiative to bring joy to SNACPack recipients across the district.  Students from all grade levels came together to create and distribute Family Game Night bags, spreading cheer and fostering community connections.

Here’s how our students contributed:

  • Kindergarten & Grade 1: Decorated bags with cheerful designs.
  • Grade 2: Crafted festive gift tags.
  • Grade 3: Packaged M&Ms and marshmallows.
  • Grade 4: Designed personalized cards for families.
  • Grade 5: Wrapped and assembled the bags into fun, family-friendly packages.

Each bag includes hot cocoa, cups, marshmallows, M&Ms, a personalized card, a game, and microwave popcorn—everything needed for a cozy family night filled with laughter and connection.

This project showcased the generosity, creativity, and compassion of our students, staff, and school community.
